dependencies-comments.react: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces.
dependencies-comments.react-dom: React package for working with the DOM.

devDependencies-comments.@testing-library/jest-dom: Custom jest matchers to test the state of the DOM
devDependencies-comments.@testing-library/react: Simple and complete React DOM testing utilities that encourage good testing practices.
devDependencies-comments.@testing-library/user-event: Fire events the same way the user does
devDependencies-comments.@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin: An ESLint plugin which provides lint rules for TypeScript codebases.
devDependencies-comments.@typescript-eslint/parser: An ESLint parser which leverages TypeScript ESTree to allow for ESLint to lint TypeScript source code.
devDependencies-comments.autoprefixer: PostCSS plugin to parse CSS and add vendor prefixes to CSS rules using values from Can I Use.
devDependencies-comments.eslint-config-prettier: Turns off all rules that are unnecessary or might conflict with Prettier.
devDependencies-comments.eslint-plugin-react: React specific linting rules for ESLint
devDependencies-comments.eslint: ESLint is a tool for identifying and reporting on patterns found in ECMAScript/JavaScript code.
devDependencies-comments.global-jsdom: Global JSDOM is a global variable that is used to share the JSDOM instance across tests.
devDependencies-comments.husky: Modern native Git hooks made easy for monorepos and micro-repos.
devDependencies-comments.jsdom: A JavaScript implementation of the WHATWG DOM and HTML standards, for use with node.js
devDependencies-comments.knip: Knip finds unused files, dependencies and exports in your JavaScript and TypeScript projects.
devDependencies-comments.lint-staged: Run linters against staged git files and don't let :poop: slip into your code base!
devDependencies-comments.postcss: A tool for transforming CSS with JavaScript
devDependencies-comments.prettier: Prettier is an opinionated code formatter
devDependencies-comments.resize-observer-polyfill: A polyfill for the Resize Observer API
devDependencies-comments.tailwindcss: A utility-first CSS framework for rapid UI development.
devDependencies-comments.typescript: TypeScript is a language for application-scale JavaScript.
devDependencies-comments.vitest: Vitest is a modern JavaScript testing framework for the modern web.
devDependencies-comments.wrangler: Cloudflare's command line tool for managing Workers and related services.
